contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of June, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED. To the extent the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief requests extraordinary relief, it is DENIED. To the extent the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief requests mandamus relief, it is GRANTED. The Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is directed to dispose of Petitioner’s pending petition within 90 days of this order.
